title: Link
description: Navigation element for internal and external pages

frontMatter.title: Link
frontMatter.description: Navigation element for internal and external pages

when_to_use.value: Navigation within a page using anchors/jump links
Opening relevant applications via email addresses or phone numbers
Less prominent links needing less emphasis than Action links
As breadcrumb replacement in multi-step forms
Short forms with few concise steps
Linking to external websites; must indicate external status

when_to_consider_else.value: **Use buttons for actions:** Form submissions, state changes, "Add," "Close," "Cancel," "Save"
**Use Action links for CTAs:** Important calls-to-action requiring visual emphasis
**Use On this page:** For table of contents with 2+ H2 sections

accessibility.value: **Material honesty:** Don't style links as buttons or vice versa
**Keyboard navigation:** Tab to navigate, Enter to activate
**Purpose clarity:** Link text must indicate destination
**External links:** Append "(opens in a new tab)" text
**Avoid headers as links:** Headers serve structural purposes

frontMatter.code_usage:
<!-- Default link -->
<va-link href="/page" text="Link text"></va-link>

<!-- External link -->
<va-link href="https://example.com" text="External site"></va-link>

<!-- Download link -->
<va-link
  download
  filetype="PDF"
  href="/file.pdf"
  text="Download form"
></va-link>

<!-- Back link -->
<va-link href="/previous" text="Back"></va-link>
